context: eBay Inc. is a e-commerce marketplace platform focused on online auctions, fixed-price sales, and classifieds. Dominated online auctions. Survived dot-com bust profitably.

competitors.name: Yahoo! Auctions
competitors.notes: Free auctions but lacked eBay's community feel and wide product array

competitors.name: Amazon Auctions
competitors.notes: Amazon's attempt to compete in auction space

competitors.name: Onsale
competitors.notes: Higher revenue but showed losses, provided inventory unlike eBay

competitors.name: uBid
competitors.notes: Focused on refurbished electronics, 533K registered users

competitors.name: Priceline.com
competitors.notes: Name-your-price model for travel and goods

competitors.name: Bidz.com
competitors.notes: Online jewelry and goods auction site
